FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the Requestor and the Publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: C2CX-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of information being transferred between the Components

FIELD.NAME: COUNTER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of times that the C2CX Resource message has been published, including this message.

FIELD.NAME: PUB-RATE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Rate the data is being collected and published. The default publishing rate is 30 seconds. A rate of zero or less indicates this message is not being repeatedly published.

FIELD.NAME: OPER-SYS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Operating system component is using

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-CPUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of CPUs being monitored

FIELD.NAME: CPU.1.MEM
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Amount of memory for this CPU

FIELD.NAME: CPU.1.MEM-UTIL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Memory utilization. Percentage of memory utilized.

FIELD.NAME: CPU.1.UTIL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: CPU utilization. Percentage of CPU utilized

FIELD.NAME: CPU.1.PAGE-FAULTS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of page faults

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-DISKS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of disks being monitored

FIELD.NAME: DISK.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the disk

FIELD.NAME: DISK.1.SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute size of the disk

FIELD.NAME: DISK.1.UTIL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Disk space utilization. Percentage of Disk space utilized.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-NET-PORTS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of network ports

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the network port

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.EUI-ADR
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Media Access Control (MAC) or Extended Unique Identifier (EUI) physical address. MAC-48, EUI-48, or EUI-64 format.

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.IP-ADR
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Internet Protocol (IP) logical address. IPv4 (32-bit) or IPv6 (128-bit) format.

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.TOTAL-BANDWIDTH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bandwidth of the port in Kbps

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.UTIL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Percentage of Network port utilization

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.BYTES-SENT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of bytes sent over the port

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.BYTES-RECEIVED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of bytes received over the port

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.MSGS-SENT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages sent over the port

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.MSGS-RECEIVED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages received over the port

FIELD.NAME: NET-PORT.1.ERRORS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of errors encountered on the port
